title: Engineering
description: A broad field with multiple branches such as Computer Science, Mechanical, Civil, and Electrical Engineering. Engineers design, build, and innovate solutions for real-world problems.

title: Civil Services
description: Civil services offer leadership roles in government sectors such as IAS, IPS, IFS, and IRS. It is a prestigious career path with societal impact and responsibility.

title: Medicine & Healthcare
description: A career dedicated to patient care, research, and medical advancements. Includes doctors, nurses, pharmacists, and healthcare specialists.

title: Law
description: Lawyers, judges, and legal advisors play a crucial role in maintaining justice and upholding legal systems. Careers include corporate law, criminal law, and judiciary.

title: Entrepreneurship
description: Starting and managing businesses, creating innovative solutions, and building companies from scratch. A career path for risk-takers and innovators.
